title: Identify Customers for Win-Back Campaign
description: A marketer wants to send a special offer to customers who haven't made a purchase in the last six months.

tasks.description: Query the customer database for all customers whose last purchase date was more than 180 days ago.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of 'lapsed' customers.

tasks.description: Filter out any customers who have unsubscribed from marketing emails.
tasks.expected_outcome: System refines the list to only include mailable customers.

tasks.description: Save the final list as a 'Win-Back Campaign' audience segment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent saves the new segment for a marketing campaign.
